ch.epfl.lis.wingj.structure

Class Structure

  • java.lang.Object
    • ij.process.FloatPolygon
      • ch.epfl.lis.wingj.structure.Compartment
        • ch.epfl.lis.wingj.structure.Structure
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    WPouchStructure

    public abstract class Structure
extends Compartment
    Abstract class to extend to describe a morphological structure to identify using an extended instance of StructureDetector.

    Each structure made of Compartment and Boundary object contains an instance of a class extending StructureSnake. StructureSnake is used to provide an accurate, parameterized description of Structure using B-splines.

    The 2D structure itself extend the class Compartment. An example of extended classes is given by WPouchStructure.

    Version:
    November 9, 2011
    Author:
    Thomas Schaffter (thomas.schaff...@gmail.com), Ricard Delgado-Gonzalo (ricard.delg...@gmail.com)

      Mean aggregated structure.

      static int AGGREGATION_MEAN_PLUS_STD
      Mean+std aggregated structure (only structure contour is affected, boundaries are still obtained by the mean method).
      static java.lang.String STRUCTURE_DEFAULT_FILENAME
      Default filename for exporting structure to file.

      • getExpressionTrajectory

        public abstract double getExpressionTrajectory(Boundary boundary,
                             int referenceBoundary,
                             double offset)
                                        throws java.lang.Exception
        Computes a Boundary trajectory along which expression can be measured (passed by reference).

        The double value returned is the length of the negative part in the current unit. For instance, Boundary.length() returns the value in the correct unit.

        Parameters:
        boundary - Trajectory along which expression will be measured.
        referenceBoundary - Takes value WJSettings.BOUNDARY_AP or WJSettings.BOUNDARY_DV.
        offset - Takes values in [-1,1].
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
